title: 1979년 United States v. Leroy Henry 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Leroy Henry. 판결일: 1979-10-16. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Leroy HENRY, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 1979-10-16
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Godbold, Rubin, Skelton

## 변호인

Frederick E. Graves, Miami, Fla. (Court-appointed), for defendant-appellant., A. Scott Miller, Linda C. Hertz, Asst. U. S. Attys., Miami, Fla., for plaintiff-appellee.

## 인용

- 604 F.2d 908

## 판결문 요약

604 F.2d 908
    UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee,v.Leroy HENRY, Defendant-Appellant.
    No. 78-5371.
    United States Court of Appeals,Fifth Circuit.
    Oct. 16, 1979.
    
      Frederick E. Graves, Miami, Fla.  (Court-appointed), for defendant-appellant.
      A. Scott Miller, Linda C. Hertz, Asst. U. S. Attys., Miami, Fla., for plaintiff-appellee.
      Appeal from the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida.
      Before GODBOLD, Circuit Judge, SKELTON, Senior Judge,* and RUBIN, Circuit Judge.
      SKELTON, Senior Judge.
    
    
      1
      Appellant, Leroy Henry, a citizen of Jamaica, was indicted, tried by a jury, and convicted in the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida for falsely and wilfully representing himself to be a citizen of the United States in violation of 18 U.S.C. § 911.1  He was sentenced to imprisonment for a period of sixty days.  The Appellant has appealed his conviction and sentence to this court.  We affirm.
    
    I. FACTS
    
      2
      On January 18, 1978, the Appellant, Leroy Henry, arrived at Miami International Airport aboard an Air Jamaica flight which had originated in Jamaica.  He approached the first immigration inspector, Laura Lee Hankins, and presented both a customs declaration form prepared in the name of Samuel Earl Lymas whose birth date was listed as October 13, 1947, and a birth certificate in the name of Samuel Earl Lymas, who was born on Octobe...
